hanzi-su-wiki:
錯

Значения

Ошибаться, запутываться

Мнемоника

Точильный камень снимает старый 昔 металл 金. Иногда точат неправильно, тупят острие.

Варианты

错
purpleculture_pinyin:
cuò
mistake; wrong; bad; interlocking; complex; to grind; to polish; to alternate; to stagger; to miss; to let slip; to evade; to inlay with gold or silver
ошибка; неправильный; Плохо; блокировка; сложный; молоть; полировать; чередовать; шататься; пропустить; позволить ускользнуть; уклоняться; инкрустировать золотом или серебром
rtega_mnemonic:
錯錯RS
错错		error, blunder, mistake, wrong, disorderly
  • having old 昔 money 金 lying around which has no value anymore: a costly mistake
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 错)
Antonyms: 對
Ideographic: Gold 釒 that once was 昔 but is lost
purpleculture_examples:
錯誤 [ cuò wù ]: error; mistake; Classifiers: 个 ; mistaken; false; wrong
錯過 [ cuò guò ]: to miss (train, opportunity etc)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 昔 [ xī ] past, former; ancient
heisig_chinese_memo: In times past, people got confused because there were so many kinds of metal coins, and they would frequently be mistaken.  These days cashless options are more common.
heisig_constituent: confused, metal, gold, once upon a time, storyteller, salad, sun, day
koohiiStory1: A long time ago, people of the world got confused because there were so many kinds of Metal coins. today we only have the euro.
koohiiStory2: Once upon a time, it was thought that the ancient "art" of alchemy could transform anything into gold. At that time, people were obviously confused about the difference between reality and myth. (Arguably people are still as confused as ever, just about different things now.).
jp_example_words:
錯誤(さくご): mistake
錯覚(さっかく): optical illusion, hallucination
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This was pure gold long ago, but now it's not. It's mixed with something else.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You could swear this thing was gold a long time ago. Now it's a mix of different things.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: It's mixed (and not pure anymore) because it was put in that sack (さく) filled with various other things.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Since it was in that sack for so long, it just ended up getting mixed with the other stuff in that sack. It was gold a long time ago, but now it's mixed with everything else.
Ru_Words:
交錯こうさく
  • запутанность, переплетение
  • замешанность, соучастие
    • warodai
    錯覚さっかく
  • оптический обман, иллюзия, галлюцинация
  • превратное (ошибочное) представление, иллюзия, заблуждение
    • warodai
    錯誤さくご
  • ошибка, заблуждение
    • warodai
    錯乱さくらん
  • расстройство, беспорядок
    • warodai
    錯視さくし
  • оптический обман, оптическая иллюзия
    • warodai
    錯簡さっかん
  • перепутанные страницы (книги, при брошюровке), неправильная брошюровка
  • беспорядочность изложения
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 廾 (двадцать), 日 (день), 金 (золото)
Ru_trainchinese:
cuò: (прил) ошибочный; плохой
cuò: (глаг/сущ) упускать; разводить во времени; ошибка, вина
cuò: (графема) переплетаться, скрещиваться; сложный, запутанный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: ancient (昔) gold (金) was confused
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In times past people could've easily mistaken one country's metal money for another's.  Nowadays money has such distinct designs that it's hard to mix them up.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Gold " and " Xi ", the original meaning is the sharpening stone and grinding stone for cutting jade. "Shu‧Yugong": "Xi Gong Qing is wrong." Kong Chuan: "To treat jade is wrong, and to treat the wrong." Kong Yingda Shu: "There are jade in the Qing, so it is said that "to treat jade is wrong." "Treat the chime wrong."

" Wrong " can mean gold finish. "Shuowen": "Golden Tuye. From the gold to the past sound." "Salt and Iron Theory-Sansufficiency": "The middle one is Shuyu ware, the gold Cuoshu cup." It can also refer to inlay decorations. "Mandarin ‧ Jinyu Eighth": "While you can make cars and jade, you can make bribes from princes." Wei Zhao's note: "Wrong, wrong."

" Wrong " also means a file. Han Liuxiang's "Biography of Women-Lu Zang's Grandmother": "The wrong one is to treat the saw, and the saw to treat the wood."

" Wrong " also means polishing and pondering. "Heguanzi•Tailu": "Going to the square and wrong circle is a holy lesson."

" Wrong " also means crossing or crossing. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Chu Ci": "Serving guests as guests, offering rewards interlaced." Mao Chuan: "Things are friendship, evil acts are wrong."

Intermixing and mixing are also called " wrong ". "Shu‧Yugong": "Jue Fu is only up and wrong, Jue Tian is only in the middle." Kong Chuan: "Up and up, first. Wrong, mixed, mixed with second Fu." Kong Yingda Shu: "Interlaced is mixed. Righteousness, so wrong is miscellaneous."

" Wrong " can mean change or alternation. Tang Wangbo's "Preface to Shou Sui": "Spring, Autumn, Winter, and Summer, the four prefaces of the cold inflammation;

" Wrong " also often means wrong and perverse. "Mo Zi‧ Fei Ming Shang": "Even if you don't want to insist on the words of the destined, you must not get it. Is it wrong?" Zhang Chunyi's explanation: "Wrong, wrong, wrong." "Ji Yun‧ Duo "Rhyme": "Wrong, good."

" Wrong " can also mean deviation and violation. Han Huankuan's "Salt and Iron Theory-Xiangci": "According to the ancient text, it is said that it should be the world, and the mistakes of the time, the glue column and the adjustment, the solid and difficult to fit."

" Wrong " can also mean missed. Song Fan Dacheng "Re-title Bai Fu": "Xiangshan Wrong Fangchen in his late years, ask for wine and find flowers and smile."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Gold " and " Xi ", the original meaning is to cut jade stone, grinding stone.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「昔」聲，本義為琢玉石的礪石，磨石。《書‧禹貢》：「錫貢磬錯。」孔傳：「治玉石曰錯，治磬錯。」孔穎達疏：「磬有以玉為之者，故云『治玉石曰錯』，謂『治磬錯』也。」

　　「錯」可表示用金涂飾。《說文》：「金涂也。从金，昔聲。」《鹽鐵論‧散不足》：「中者舒玉紵器，金錯蜀杯。」也可泛指嵌飾。《國語‧晉語八》：「而能金玉其車，文錯其服，能行諸侯之賄。」韋昭注：「錯，錯鏤。」

　　「錯」也表示銼刀。漢劉向《列女傳‧魯臧孫母》：「錯者所以治鋸，鋸者所以治木也。」

　　「錯」亦表示打磨、琢磨。《鶡冠子‧泰錄》：「去方錯圓，神聖之鑒也。」

　　「錯」還表示交錯、交叉。《詩‧小雅‧楚茨》：「為賓為客，獻酬交錯。」毛傳：「東西為交，邪行為錯。」

　　間雜、混雜也稱為「錯」。《書‧禹貢》：「厥賦惟上上錯，厥田惟中中。」孔傳：「上上，第一。錯，雜，雜出第二之賦。」孔穎達疏：「交錯是間雜之義，故錯為雜也。」

　　「錯」可表示更迭，交替。唐王勃〈守歲序〉：「春秋冬夏，錯四序之涼炎；甲乙丙丁，紀三朝之曆數。」

　　「錯」亦常表示錯誤、乖謬。《墨子‧非命上》：「今雖毋求執有命者之言，必不可得，不亦錯乎？」張純一集解：「錯，舛也，誤也。」《集韻‧鐸韻》：「錯，乖也。」

　　「錯」還可表示背離、違背。漢桓寬《鹽鐵論‧相刺》：「據古文以應當世，猶辰參之錯，膠柱而調瑟，固而難合矣。」

　　「錯」也可表示錯過。宋范大成〈再題白傅〉：「香山晚歲錯芳辰，索酒尋花一笑欣。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「昔」聲，本義為琢玉石的礪石，磨石。

錯錯RS
错错 		error, blunder, mistake, wrong, disorderly
  • having old 昔 money 金 lying around which has no value anymore: a costly mistake
(Simplified: 错)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 對
Ideographic: Gold 釒 that once was 昔 but is lost
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 昔 [ xī ] past, former; ancient
①不正確，與實際不符：差錯。過錯。錯訛。錯謬。錯覺。錯怪。不錯。錯愛。將錯就錯。
②交叉着：交錯。錯亂。錯雜。錯綜(縱橫交叉)。錯動。錯落(交錯紛雜)。盤根錯節。
③叉開：錯開。錯車。錯過機會。
④用來打磨玉石的石頭：它山之石，可以爲錯。
⑤打磨玉石：攻錯。
⑥鍍金、銀，塗飾：錯金。錯銀。錯彩鏤金。

錯字的基本解释

錯
cuò
见“错”。

錯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuò］
［《廣韻》倉各切，入鐸，清。］
“错1”的繁体字。“厝2”的今字。
(1)琢玉石的砺石，磨石。
(2)打磨；磨擦。
(3)引申为锋利。
(4)切磋砥砺。
(5)锉刀。
(6)指用锉刀锉。
(7)粗糙。
(8)以金银嵌饰。
(9)泛指镶嵌或绘绣。
(10)隐藏；隐居。
(11)交错；交叉。
(12)参差不齐。参见“錯落”。
(13)如雁飞“人”字时前后成斜线。
(14)更迭，交替。
(15)间杂；混杂。
(16)繁多。
(17)错乱；杂乱。
(18)背离；违背。
(19)岔开；分开。
(20)移动；转动。
(21)已经过去；错过。
(22)误，不正确。
(23)过错；过失。
(24)坏；差。用于否定式。
(25)惊惧小心貌。
(26)指夭折。
(27)小鼎。
(28)通“挫”。犹言刺，挖苦。
(29)通“挫”。摧折，折断。参见“錯折”。
(30)通“笮”。
(31)通“策”。

錯字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　錯； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1312第12
〔古文〕䥘【唐韻】【集韻】倉各切【韻會】淸各切【正韻】七各切，?音厝。【說文】金涂也。【前漢·食貨志】錯刀，以黃金錯其文，一刀直五千，與五銖錢?行。【註】錯刀，王莽錢。【張衡詩】何以贈之金錯刀。　又【詩·大雅】簟茀錯衡。【傳】錯衡，文衡也。【史記·趙世家】剪髮文身，錯臂左衽。【註】錯臂亦文身，謂以丹靑錯畫其臂。　又【玉篇】鑢也。【書·禹貢】錫貢磬錯。【疏】治玉石曰錯。磬有以玉爲之者，磬錯，謂治磬錯也。　又【正韻】厲石也。【詩·小雅】他山之石，可以爲錯。【傳】錯，石也，可以琢玉。【釋文】錯，厲石也。　又【玉篇】雜也。【書·禹貢】厥賦惟上上錯。【傳】錯，雜出。【疏】交錯是閒雜之義，故錯爲雜也。　又亂也。【尚書·孔安國序】錯亂磨滅，勿可復知。　又【易·繫辭】錯綜其數。【疏】錯謂交錯。【禮·文王世子】禮樂交錯于中。又【祭義】不錯則隨。【註】錯，鴈行也。父黨隨行，兄黨鴈行。【詩·小雅】獻醻交錯。【傳】東西爲交，邪行爲錯。　又【集韻】乖也。【增韻】舛也，誤

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuò]
["Guangyun" Cangdi cuts, enters duo, Qing. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "該1". The present character of "厝2".
(1) Grinding stones and grinding stones for cutting jade.
(2) Polishing; friction.
(3) The extension is sharp.
(4) Discuss and learn from each other.
(5) File.
(6) Refers to file with a file.
(7) Rough.
(8) Embellished with gold and silver.
(9) Generally refers to inlaid or painted embroidery.
(10) To hide; to live in seclusion.
(11) Staggered; crossed.
(12) Uneven. See "scattered".
(13) For example, the character "人" in Yan Fei forms a diagonal line before and after it.
(14) Alternate, alternate.
(15) Mixed; mixed.
(16) Many.
(17) Confusion; disorder.
(18) Deviation; Violation.
(19) To diverge; separate.
(20) Move; rotate.
(21) It has passed; missed.
(22) False, incorrect.
(23) Fault; negligence.
(24) Bad; bad. Used in negative expressions.
(25) Fear and careful appearance.
(26) Refers to premature death.
(27) Xiaoding.
(28) Through "frustration". Still thorny, sarcasm.
(29) Through "frustration". Destroy, break. See "wrong folding".
(30) Through "Ru".
(31) Through "strategy".
wrong

wrong
Name meaning
Nothing.
cuò, cù, xī
вм. 错
Radicals: 金, 昔  (gold, long-ago)
Meaning Mnemonic
This was pure gold long ago, but now it's not. It's mixed with something else.
You could swear this thing was gold a long time ago. Now it's a mix of different things.
Reading Mnemonic
It's mixed (and not pure anymore) because it was put in that sack (さく) filled with various other things.
Since it was in that sack for so long, it just ended up getting mixed with the other stuff in that sack. It was gold a long time ago, but now it's mixed with everything else.
